Title: Real estate backed projects pros and cons.
Body: Tokenized real estate is kinda wild  its flipping the script with fractional ownership, easy trading, and some sweet passive income vibes. But is it legit safe? Lets chew it over:   Why Its Cool:   Low Buy-In: You dont need a fat wallet to jump into real estate anymore.  Liquidity: Swap those property tokens way faster than selling a house.  Transparency: Blockchains got your back with legit, trackable ownership.  Chill Income: Rental cash without dealing with leaky faucets or tenants.  The Sketchy Bits:   Regulation Mess: Laws are still playing catch-up, so its a gray zone.  Platform Trust: If the sites shady, your investments at risk.  Thin Markets: Early days mean finding buyers or sellers can be a slog.  Rollercoaster Vibes: Token prices can swing hard, not like boring stable bricks.  Curious? Stuff like RIO, LAND, and PROPC seem solid theyve got real-world assets tied in.   Not tryna shill  DYOR before you YOLO your cash. Thoughts? Anyone dabbling in this yet?

Top-3-comments.comment: Tokenization isnt just hype anymore. The market cap of this sector is already reflecting its potential, and the growing institutional adoption of tokenized assets proves it's here to stay. RIO, LAND, and other top projects are leading the way, while Vaulta might just be another rising starespecially as EOS transitions into Web3 banking and tokenized assets (real estate) with key partnerships like CeFFU and Spirit Blockchain.
Well said! Tokenized real estate is a great way to diversify your portfolio and gain exposure to the real estate market without the high entry barriers.
I dabble in tokenized real estate and find it fascinating. However, I would caution new investors to do their due diligence and be wary of the risks involved.

Title: MANTRA (OM): The Crypto Ponzi Nobody Wants To Talk About (But I Will)
Body: Alright, lets rewind a bit and see how this shitshow got started. So, MANTRA. (OM) popped up on the radar in late 2023, right when the crypto space was already drowning in uncertainty. Outta nowhere, whispers started flying about a possible takeover. And guess what? Some big-name founder (whos probably trusted way too much) got hit with an offer to buy 30 of the projects tokens and tech for a cool 10 million. LMAO, what a bargain, right? Dude passed on the deal, but vultures LOVE distressed assets, and MANTRA being listed on Binance made it look extra juicy. Fast forward to December 2023 - boom, deal done. The buyers? Sharooq Ventures and Laser Digital (aka a Nomura Bank side hustle). What followed was the ol pump-and-dump playbook: grab a ton of tokens, jack up trading volume, and convince bag-holders theyre in on the next big thing. By early 2024, MANTRA was suddenly the hot topic in Web3, seeing miraculous price increases even when the market was tanking. Analysts were side-eyeing hard, noticing how a few big wallets were straight-up controlling the tokens price. Shocker. Come late 2024, some investors started asking, Uh, wheres my unlocked tokens? but lol, good luck with that. The MANTRA team just kept pushing back token unlocks like it was some kinda never-ending pre-launch waitlist. And those investors? Too scared to raise hell cuz the team held most of the damn supply. MANTRA Hits 8 But Whats Actually There? By February 2025, OM hit 8, making early investors laugh their way to the bank. But lets be real: no actual tech, no partnerships, and barely any blockchain activity. The market cap jumped from 5B to 7.16B in 24 hours, totally organic, Im sure. And heres where it gets even sketchier: 30 of all MANTRA tokens are chilling in just 10 wallets, each stacked with 150M to 1.2B. Meanwhile, real cryptos like ETH? 99 of its supply is spread out across normie wallets holding less than a grand. But nah, totally not manipulated, guys. So yeah, whos actually behind this circus? And why the hell is so much money being funneled in so aggressively? Meet The Masterminds. MANTRA (formerly MANTRA DAO) claims to be all about staking, DeFi, and Web3 finance. But if you peek behind the curtain, its really just a bunch of dudesJohn Patrick Mullin, Rodrigo Quan Miranda, and Will Corkinpulling the strings. In March 2024, they flexed about an 11M funding round led by Shorooq Partners, with backing from a laundry list of investors. But uh, did any of them actually check if MANTRA has a real product? Oh, and fun fact: The founders are also getting sued by RioDeFi shareholders, who say MANTRA DAO was basically stolen from them. Court-ordered financial disclosures are on the way, but so far, MANTRAs financial statements are conveniently missing, and the whitepaper link on their site? DEAD. Promises vs. Reality Back in the day, Mullin hyped up MANTRA like it was the second coming of Ethereum, talking about prototypes, millions in assets staked, and massive TVL. Fast forward four years? LMAO, nothing. No launchpads, no working products, nada. According to insiders, the founders even tried pawning off a huge chunk of the project for 510M but couldnt justify why anyone should pay that much. So what did they do instead? Market manipulation, baby. Classic. User Complaints: This Aint It, Chief For a so-called top 20 crypto, MANTRA has some of the deadest community engagement out there. Theyve got 500K followers on X (Twitter), but their posts barely crack 1020 comments. And Reddit? Ghost town. Meanwhile, random meme coins with smaller market caps have communities that are actually alive. Then theres the whole staking scam. One poor sucker tried unstaking 1K worth of OM and ended up paying 2,700 in fees. Yeah, you read that righthe lost more than he was trying to withdraw. The guy even warned others: They locked liquidity for their OGs and hit us with insane fees. Remember this when you decide to stake with them. But sure, lets pretend this token isnt just an exit liquidity farm. The Real Risks OTC Investors: Your tokens are locked, and you aint getting out anytime soon. Good luck. Retail Investors: The big wallets own most of the supply, so expect price manipulation and eventual rugging. Binance: Maybe do an actual audit before listing the next Ponzi, yeah? Final Thoughts: Whos Getting Wrecked First? MANTRA is just another project thats all smoke and mirrorsbuilt on token control and aggressive market manipulation rather than actual innovation. If youre still thinking about throwing money into this mess, just know that the big players will cash out first, and retail investors? Theyre the ones wholl be left crying in the end. Dont be the sucker left holding the bag.

Top-3-comments.Comment: Whoa, this post is a goldmine of info. Thanks for sharing!
This sounds like a huge mess. I wonder how many people have lost money on this.
Its crazy how some projects can just create hype and manipulate the market like this.

Title: AI-Powered Dexplore Analysis vs. Traditional Blockchain Analysis
Body: In the fast-paced world of crypto, speed and accuracy are everything. Let's break down how AI-powered analysis stacks up against traditional blockchain methods: Speed AI quickly scans and interprets data, while traditional methods can take much longer. Accuracy AI minimizes human error, while manual analysis is more prone to mistakes. Insights AI detects patterns and anomalies in real-time, while traditional methods rely more on past data. Efficiency AI automates tasks and reduces the workload, whereas traditional analysis is labor-intensive. Adaptability AI evolves with new data, while traditional methods need manual updates to stay relevant. This is where DexCheck AI comes into play. If you're looking to level up your crypto analysis with AI-driven insights and smarter, more efficient trading, DexCheck is your go-to tool. Title: The Future of Vehicle Sales: How Blockchain is Revolutionizing the Industry.
Body: The Problem with the Traditional Market Lack of Trust: Vehicle history reports often rely on centralized databases, which are vulnerable to manipulation. This makes it harder for buyers to verify accident records, maintenance details, or previous ownership. Costly Financing: Getting a loan often means dealing with banks, credit agencies, and hefty interest rates. The process is slow, expensive, and favors those with established credit histories. Tedious Ownership Transfers: Transferring a vehicle title can involve multiple third parties, extensive paperwork, and frustrating delays. Limited Global Access: Buying or selling vehicles across borders is complicated and expensive, making it nearly impossible for the average person. How Blockchain is Flipping the Script Accurate Vehicle Histories: With blockchain, every repair, accident, and title transfer is recorded in a tamper-proof, decentralized ledger, giving buyers and sellers full transparency. Cheaper, Fairer Financing: Platforms like CarrDefi offer decentralized lending, reducing the need for traditional banks. This creates more affordable and accessible financing options for a wider range of people. Effortless Ownership Transfers: Smart contracts can automate the entire ownership transfer process, making it instantaneous and secureno middlemen, no delays. Seamless Global Transactions: Blockchain makes cross-border vehicle sales easier by removing the need for third-party verification, saving time and money. Suggest some more project which are unique like this it help me Alot.

Top-3-comments.Comment-body: I never thought about the potential of blockchain in vehicle sales! Thanks for sharing this insightful post.
Cool! I'm excited to see how blockchain will change the vehicle sales industry.

Title: How do coinbase fees work?
Body: I was trying to put in a daily recurring bitcoin order, but realized the fees changed in intervals, NOT price. I then calculated the RELATIVE fee (feeprice to buy) for each price interval in excel. (11-26: 1.49 FEE) (27-51: 1.99 FEE). (52-203: 3.74 FEE) The calculations are shown. I originally wanted to do 25 daily buy. But this fee had a 5.96 relative fee. You get lower relative fee with 26 at 5.73. However, 27 increased the fee interval so it would be 7.37 fee. Is this correct to assume? By this logic, 203 will give the lowest relative fee.

Title: How Tokenization and Web3 Projects are Shaping the Future of the Real Estate Market.
Body: The U.S. real estate market is projected to reach an incredible 136.62T by 2025, a massive growth that reflects both the continued demand for real estate and the increasing innovation within the industry. One of the most promising trends contributing to this expansion is the rise of tokenization, which is helping to reshape how real estate investments are made. Tokenization refers to the process of converting ownership of a property or a group of properties into digital tokens on a blockchain. These tokens can be bought, sold, and traded just like traditional assets, but with the added benefits of decentralization, transparency, and improved liquidity. This opens up opportunities for fractional ownership, where investors can buy smaller shares of a property or a real estate fund, lowering the barriers to entry and allowing a broader range of individuals to invest in high-value real estate. Web3 projects like LAND, RIO, PRO, and PROPC are uniquely positioned to benefit from this tokenization trend. These projects are leveraging blockchain technology to create platforms for fractional real estate ownership, enabling investors to access a diversified portfolio of properties with lower capital requirements. Theyre also offering a more transparent and secure way for investors to participate in the real estate market without relying on intermediaries like banks or brokers. For instance, LAND is focused on tokenizing virtual and physical real estate, while PROPC aims to simplify the process of owning shares in real-world properties through blockchain. Meanwhile, RIO and PRO are exploring ways to make real estate transactions and investments more efficient using smart contracts, further enhancing the security and ease of participation for both institutional and retail investors. One of the biggest advantages of tokenization is the enhanced liquidity it brings to traditionally illiquid real estate assets. In the past, investors had to commit large amounts of capital and wait years to realize returns on their investments. With tokenized real estate, individuals can trade their tokens on secondary markets, providing more flexibility and the ability to exit an investment more easily.
Top-3-comments: This is a game changer! I can't wait to see how this will impact the real estate market. It opens up so many opportunities for investors.
I've been following the tokenization trend for a while now and it's really exciting to see it becoming more mainstream. It has the potential to really change the way we invest in real estate.
I'm a bit skeptical about tokenization in real estate. I understand the benefits, but I'm worried about the potential risks and regulatory issues.

Title: Crypto Ratings: Helpful or Just Noise?
Body: When researching a new altcoin, what's your go-to strategy? Do you analyze the team, tokenomics, and roadmapor do you check external ratings and analytics first? Different platforms take different approaches to evaluating crypto projects. DefiLlama focuses on on-chain data like Total Value Locked (TVL), fees, and yields to assess protocol strength. TokenInsight assigns ratings based on factors like technology, adoption, and performance. Some trading apps, like the token .com app, integrate these ratings to simplify research and help users make informed decisions. But how much do these ratings really matter? Do they influence your decisions, or do you rely more on personal research, market sentiment, and price action? With so much misinformation in the space, having reliable evaluation systems could help retail investors make better choicesbut only if they're actually accurate. What's your take? Are crypto ratings useful, or are we better off ignoring them?

Top-3-comments.Comment: who will give ratings?

I think ratings can be useful, but theyre definitely not the whole picture. Some projects get hyped up with great scores but have no real adoption, while others fly under the radar despite strong fundamentals. What really matters is whats happening on-chain. TVL, for example, is a solid metric. It shows where capital is actually flowing. Look at EOS, steadily hitting new ATHs in TVL. That kind of growth speaks louder than any rating.
I have my investments already picked. Now I just look at the charts. If something will last through the next bear cycle and hasnt gone away Ill look more into it.

Title: Rugpulls and 'burned' wallets.
Body: I have been experimenting with memecoins in the last days. I have discovered a pattern of IvankaBarron coins, where the holders almost always transfer their funds to the same address after a rugpull. Initially, I made a bit about 100 from an initial investment of 50, by making 20 profits. By the next time I invested (again, same target address for funds after rugpull), they pulled liquidity at 20 gains (previously they always made 100 gains). So, i observed again, seeing them make 100 gains again, and again, and again. but every time I invested even 5 (from the wallet I initially made earnings with), they would stop at around 15 to 25 gains. Any ideas about this behaviour? I have done this a lot of times and it always the same pattern.

Title: Is a Global Bitcoin Arms Race Looming in 2025?
Body: 2025 will be a year of repudiating the acien regime, accelerated by Donald Trumps return to the U.S. presidency. Within the crypto space, capital is in flux as big business hedges its bets on the probable winners and losers. But its not just big business. Nation-states have gotten in on the act. El Salvador was the first to establish official reserves of Bitcoin. Now, several other countries are moving in that direction, including The U.S., China, Brazil, the U.K., Switzerland, Ukraine, Russia, and Bhutan, some as a result of seizing the assets of criminals and others as a result of executive foresight. Title: Shaquille ONeal Finally Agreed To Pay 11M Over NFTs Scandal.
Body: Hey guys, so I guess you all know about Shaquille ONeal and the scandal surrounding the Astrals NFT project. Well, there is finally an update so I thought I could share it. Last year ONeal was accused of hiding the risks of buying NFTs and not warning about the losses investors could have (and actually had) when the platform went down. By November 2022, the platform had shut down without any explanation or refunds for those who had purchased what turned out to be unregistered securities. As a result, investors filed a lawsuit against Shaquille ONeal. The good news is that Shaquille ONeal finally agreed to pay 11M to investors who bought its NFTs. So, if you were damaged you can check the details and file to get payment. here(https:11thestate.comcasesastrals-investors-settlement). Anyways, were you damaged by this situation? Spoofing scam in Binance
Body: A person I know lost almost 50000 in Ethereum and USDC. He received a message from Binance: Binance Your verification code is 889-937. If you did not request this contact us on 40 332 630 186 REF931482. He did the mistake to call this number and those guys explained to him that he had to transfer all the money from Binance exchange to a wallet via web3. (They even gave him their wallet seed phrase to connect to it and to send the cryptos). He did this because he thought it was everything legit. After he realized that he lost his money, he talked with the real Binance employees via support center and they said to him it was a spoofing attack (they have lots of them everyday) and they can do nothing to get his money back. He report this crime to police but I don't think they can solve this anymore. Advice: Dont fall for this scam even if the message comes from Binance, remember that Binance doesnt have a phone number for support. This is the scammers wallet: 0x9dd7D19ed1bc554CEFD378Db6c0A4BaCBfaFbE21 Transaction ID for Ethereum: 0xc9de77179ab98235dde296e080adbfe4e6d08ef32ff207336b0cb894d0cbddf3.

Title: Scammed by Headerrer
Body: Hi all, spreading the word here about a scam going around taking Eth and BnB - dont let it take yours. If anybody is approached by a lad called Aiden - username Worrisometavern or a group called Headerrer bot, report it. I was asked to be a moderator in their scam group testing a bot on remix. Stupidly I used my own BnB and it was sent to a scam address which looks like its accumulated a lot of tokens. Of course since sending, the comms stopped and hes got my money. I know what everyone will say, but it happens time and time again, Im just here to put his name out there. He had a tutorial online which I have reported too. If anybody is interested in the address message me. Looks like theres about 200k roughly sitting in it according to BSC.

Top-3-comments.Comment: Lol legit just messaged me so I typed his name in and saw this. Sorry that happened to you bro, his account and everything is gone now but they’re sure to be back under another name. With that said, they’ll use the same tactics.
Glad I could have helped at least one person.

Title: Why are alt coins going down?
Body: Everything has gone up for weeks now, so what gives today? Is it just another opportunity to buy low before the god candles? Im just disappointed and getting emo about pretty much my entire portfolio tanking today. NEAR RNDR AVAX FET ALGO HBAR CARDANO GRT SOLANA XLM WIF SUI WELL These are all supposed winners for the next 2025 season. What gives. Whats the market doing? Whats it gonna do?

Top-3-comments.Comment: New here eh?

Coins go up, and coins go down. You didn't expect everything to keep going up indefinitely did you? If something has been going up for weeks, of course it is going to have a correction. Hold. There is much more upside coming. Take the opportunity to buy the dip if you can. But remember to sell next year.
Theres lots of drugs that do much better w dopamine and they can get you to the moon much faster all the way to the dark side of the moon if you're not careful.

Title: CubeSatGPT: Talk with Satellites Orbiting in Space with AI Agents  Models by Vector Space Biosciences
Body: CubeSatGPT enables anyone to communicate with satellites and their payloads launched by Vector Space Biosciences. 50 Waterbears (Tardigrades) will be launched into space on CubeSats (nanosatellites) to generate high-value datasets related to microgravity and space radiation (stressors) beamed back to Earth using Microsoft Orbital ground stations. Datasets will be analyzed using advanced AI modeling, AI agents, inference, generative AI layers and visualizations. This pipeline will lead to new discoveries in medicine, materials, molecular, chemical and life sciences resulting from space-based operations and the new space economy. Vector Space Biosciences founder and CEO, Kasian Franks, states: Imagine enabling a student to ask a CubeSat carrying Waterbears questions using a prompt like How are the Waterbears doing today? or Describe how cold it is in space for the Waterbears to more advanced prompts involving details related to measurements in microgravity and radiation associated with payloads. This innovative CubeSatGPT module will be optional for all CubeSat launches including those for biotechnology, pharmaceutical, materials science and AI semiconductor payloads. Recently, stakeholders and shareholders of public and private companies, including Microstrategy (MSTR), have seen extraordinary benefits from holding part of their capital reserves in cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC) and other alternative assets. Vector Space Biosciences is a private company structured to benefit stakeholders and shareholders which include our users, customers, partners and collaborators. Today, and similar to other proven and successful models, this is based on our own operations and holdings in cryptocurrencies. Our weighted holdings include Bitcoin (BTC), Vector Space Biosciences (SBIO), Vectorspace AI X (VAIX) including other spinoffs and subsidiaries through our VSB Ventures unit with each having a specific industry focus, corporate structure, equity arm, crypto arm, product line and revenue. A limited number of free subscriptions to the CubeSatGPT service will be available to K-12 students, teachers, educational institutions and EdTech companies as a utility enabling safe and secure access for students to communicate with CubeSats and get updates and education on tardigrades, CubeSats, space conditions, etc. This is a powerfully innovative way for children to learn about space and space biosciences. Each subscription comes with 1 SBIO AI model cryptocurrency token enabling access to CubeSatGPT. SBIO tokens can also be used by customers, partners and collaborators to access specialized services related to design, development and launching industry specific payload support in areas such as medicine, materials, molecular, chemical and life sciences resulting from space-based operations. These tokens can be traded or bought and sold on exchanges today. For an information packet on CubeSatGPT or additional payload services: infovectorspacebio.science (mailto:infovectorspacebio.science) About Vector Space Biosciences VSB develops AI models with data from the space industry based on enabling biotechnology, pharmaceutical and AI semiconductor customers to launch payloads via CubeSats enabling development of new drug compounds to the radiation-hardening of AI semiconductors. Data from biological payloads along with AI modeling (language modeling) can be used to develop new forms of precision medicine related to human aging and cancer or provide insights into radiations effect on AI semiconductors used in data centers being built in space today. Our primary goal connects to understanding how to develop countermeasures against stressors on the human body during spaceflight, like microgravity and radiation, resulting in new forms of precision medicine for all mankind. VSB maintains the token symbol SBIO, a utility token based in Dubai and parent company to VAIX and other spinoffs in the space and precision medicine industry. More information can be found here: https://vectorspacebio.science/technology. Contacts Christopher Bartlett christhinkgem.com (mailto:christhinkgem.com) 203-494-4806 https://vectorspacebio.science supportvectorspacebio.science (mailto:supportvectorspacebio.science) Telegram (https://t.me/2BeTSEqxgKVUwMzEx) Reddit (https://www.reddit.com/r/Vector_space_AI/3frdt3D47274) CubeSatGPT: Talk with Satellites Orbiting in Space with AI Agents  Models by Vector Space Biosciences

Top-3-comments.Comment: Wow, this is so cool! I can't wait to see what discoveries come from this project.
I'm really interested in the potential for using AI in space and how it could impact precision medicine. This is a great example of that.
I think it's great that Vector Space Biosciences is making this available to K-12 students. It's important to get the next generation interested in these fields.

NEAR8M7.08B0.11 OriginTrail (TRAC)5.6M0.407B1.38 ICP2.82M4.34B0.06. RNDR1.54M3.93B0.04 GRT1.28M1.98B0.06 AKT1.05M0.98B0.11 LPT0.31M0.39B0.08 Key Observations: 1. TRACs Undervaluation: TRACs revenue-to-market cap ratio of 1.38 is still far ahead of its peers. Despite a slightly higher market cap (407M), it remains undervalued relative to its revenue compared to other projects. 2. Real-World Usage: TRAC powers OriginTrails Decentralized Knowledge Graph, which is already being adopted in supply chain, healthcare, and enterprise ecosystems. This makes it a utility-first project rather than one driven by speculation. 3. Growth Potential: With TRAC sitting at 407M in market cap, it has substantial upside. Scaling to market caps like RNDR or ICP (in the billions) would represent significant gains for holders, especially given its revenue metrics. Questions for Discussion:  Does TRACs revenue efficiency indicate its potential for larger adoption and market cap growth?  Should market valuations better reflect actual revenue performance? Title: AI projects with real revenue?
Body: OriginTrail: An AI-Powered Blockchain with Real Revenue  In a sea of AI-related. blockchain projects, OriginTrail (TRAC) stands out as a real-world solution with. tangible revenue streams. Unlike many speculative projects riding the AI wave,. OriginTrail integrates AI and blockchain to deliver practical, revenue-. generating applications.     What Makes TRAC Unique?   OriginTrail leverages. decentralized knowledge graphs (DKGs), an AI-powered framework that organizes. and connects data efficiently. It's not just a buzzword projectits already being. used in industries like supply chain, healthcare, and retail. For example:   -. Walmart, Home Depot, and other retail giants use OriginTrail for supply chain. transparency.   - Partnerships with GS1 standards ensure global adoption and. trust.   - TRAC helps enterprises manage and authenticate critical data in a. decentralized, efficient, and cost-effective way.     Real Revenue, Real Impact. OriginTrail generates revenue through enterprise integrations and usage fees for. its ecosystem. Companies using the OriginTrail DKG create demand for TRAC. tokens, making it a blockchain project with real-world utility and cash flow.. AI Meets Blockchain   AI thrives on organized, trustworthy data, and that's. exactly what OriginTrail provides. With its decentralized knowledge graph, TRAC. powers AI systems to deliver better insights, automate processes, and enhance. decision-makingall with a trust layer built in.     A Project with Vision   As. the adoption of AI accelerates, the need for decentralized, interoperable data. systems like OriginTrail will only grow. TRACs real-world use cases and revenue. streams make it a sustainable and promising player in the blockchain and AI. space.    If you're looking for a blockchain project delivering real results and. real revenue, keep an eye on OriginTrail. Its not just speculation; its a. revolution in how data powers AI and beyond.

Top-3-comments.Comment: I follow the project and agree it's an outlier, real revenue growth compared with hype coins.

Title: Question about long term capital gains with cryptocurrency
Body: I currently use robinhood, and it works fine, I'm just worried about the long term capital gains taxes once I do sell my profits. I am currently HODLING though I did sell 200 worth for profit...so far. My question is say I get up to 100,000 or 200,000 profit eventually and want to pay off my 10,000 credit card debt and some dental bills say 20,000. Say I take the 40,000 out I need to pay my bills eventually and then take another 50,000 out to put in the checking account, and then keep 110,000 in to HODL. How much would I end up owing in capital gains? I am worried about not having enough to pay the IRS once I pay my bills off. Or say I have only 20,000 and pay part of my bills off. Say I pay 7,000 of my 10,000 I owe to get my bills down and then pay 7,000 of my dental bills. 6,000 into the checking account. How much will I have to pay come tax time for the long term capital gains?

Title: Am I Getting Scammed on GateHub?
Body: I've got XRP on GateHub that has been on there since around 2018. I tried logging in for the first time since then to send to my ledger nano s plus and I've had issues. I was able to login, but it asked me right away to re-encrypt my account, which provided me with a new 32 character recovery code that I also wrote down. I have the old recovery code and now the 'new one.' I contacted support and they are saying that there was some issue with the 're-encryption process' due to the error 'errorsecretdecrypt'  (automod doesnt like URLs so I replaced them)  I went to(support gatehub net)and used the form on the page to submit a support ticket explaining the issue. they responded with this suggestion:  'Dear Sir or Madam,      We have a possible solution to your issue.. We kindly ask you to access your account via thewallet2page, which will access the older version. After accessing your account copy-paste the following link to your URL bargatrhub url security rekeyfix,enter your current password andold password, or current password and old recovery key (received during the signup process)in the fields.  After completion of the mentioned 'Rekeyfix' process, we kindly ask you to try re-encrypting your wallet once again (the step where you previously encountered the error). After a successful re-encryption log out of the account and access the updated version of our platform'  The wallet2 url and the 'rekeyfix' url just points back to gatehuband does nothing. I responded that it did not work, then they responded with:  'Dear Sir or Madam,      Due to the error message you received, which resulted in you being unable to access your account, we will refund the funds in your GateHub wallet(s).      In order to proceed with recovering the funds in your GateHub account registered to email redacted, we kindly ask you to register a new GateHub account using a different email address than you used to register your current account.      We will refundit with the same amount of XRP that you are currently holding in your wallet.  Please respond once your profile information is filled in and documents uploaded, so we can review your verification request ahead of the queue.  In addition, we would kindly ask you for additional information.      Due to the error you are experiencing you cannot use the wallet, therefore, we kindly ask you to provide the old recovery keyyou received during the signup processor the old passwordyou used prior to re-encrypting your account. Our development team is still working on identifying the cause of the issue that you have experienced and it would help us tremendously if you could share with us the original credentials from your old account.  The recovery key is a 32-character key,generated during the GateHub signup process.It is generated only once. We suggest that you look through your computer files for a txt document titled ''gatehubrecoverykey'' you may have downloaded on 2017, the day you registered your account.  Please note that we are asking for obsolete data. The old recovery key received during the signup process is no longer valid since you received a new one during re-encryption, also the old password cannot be used to sign in to your GateHub account.  Kind regards,'  Any concerns about this? I emailed security at gatehub net2 days ago but I have not received a response. Support is saying they will refund me the XRP in my account, however they need my old recovery key? This all seems strange and I'm very skeptical. My concern is that when I logged in, it prompted me to create a new recovery code which could be fake, and my first recovery code is still valid. Then when I send my 'old' recovery code, they will gain access to my assets. Any thoughts on this would be appreciated. Thanks.
Top-3-comments: You are being scammed by whatever this support is pretending to be. dont share your 32 words anywhere except official wallets.
That sounds like a scam. Never share your recovery seed.
GateHub support is known for being unreliable. I would be cautious with them.
